explains: v. 宣判；判决（sentence 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: He said there was a need for proportionality in sentencing.
sentences.cn: 他说量刑时应当做到罚罪相当。

sentences.en: The court bailiff said jurors did not wish to speak to news media until the sentencing.
sentences.cn: 法院法警说，陪审员不想在宣判之前接受新闻媒体采访。

sentences.en: Sentencing Guidelines when they determine penalties, and in the case of animal fighting, those guidelines are outdated and extremely inadequate.
sentences.cn: 量刑指南在确定刑罚时，如果发生动物搏斗，那这些指南就已经过时了，而且非常不充分。
